Package fr.ecp.is1220.myvelib.part1

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.is1220.myvelib.part1.Station
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlusStation, StandardStation
    public abstract class Station
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    Station abstract class, implemented by the two types of stations (Standard, Plus). Has multiple parking slots, and keep tracks of the bicycles parked in them, as well as station statistics
    Author:
    pioll

      • hasBicycleAvailable

        public boolean hasBicycleAvailable​(java.lang.String type)
        Checks if there is an available bicycle of type type.
        Parameters:
        type - A String, either "electric" or "mechanic".
        Returns:
        true if there is at least a bicycle of type type available, false otherwise.

      • countParkingSlotsOccupied

        public int countParkingSlotsOccupied​(java.lang.String type)
        Count the number of occupied parking slots with a given bicycle type.
        Parameters:
        type - the bicycle type searched
        Returns:
        int the number of occupied parking slots

      • findParkingSlotOccupied

        public ParkingSlot findParkingSlotOccupied​(java.lang.String type)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Find if there is a parking slot occupied with the giver bicycle type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of bicycle searched
        Returns:
        the parking slot occupied by a bicycle of the right type
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - "No (type) bicycle found, other type available" if there are bicycles available, but of another type only
        java.lang.Exception - "No bicycle found" if there is no bicycle available.

      • findParkingSlotFree

        public ParkingSlot findParkingSlotFree​(java.util.ArrayList<ParkingSlot> parkingSlots)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Finds a free parking slot in parkingSlots. Throws an exception if no slot is free.
        Parameters:
        parkingSlots -
        Returns:
        ParkingSlot
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
